#### An interactive map of the birthplaces of all the Presidents of the United States of America along with other details in the pop ups


```{r library, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
#loading libraries
library(leaflet)
library(tidyverse)

#set working directory

setwd("D:/Users/kaushik.sivasankaran/Desktop/R/Course 9")

#importing presidents csv and cleaning data

presidents_birth_city <- read.csv("Presidents.csv", col.names = c("President", "Birthplace", "State_of_Birth",
                                                                  "Latitude", "Longitude", "Date_of_Birth",
                                                                  "In_Office"), as.is = TRUE)

presidents_birth_city$In_Office <- sub(" â€“ ", " - ", x =presidents_birth_city$In_Office)

```

```{r leaflet, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
#creating map
presidents_birth_city %>%
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions(), 
             popup = paste("President:", presidents_birth_city$President, "<br>",
                           "Birthplace:", presidents_birth_city$Birthplace, "<br>",
                           "Date of Birth:", presidents_birth_city$Date_of_Birth, "<br>",
                           "Term is office:", presidents_birth_city$In_Office))
```
